Search the register of fair rents

Last updated
4 Mar 2020

Search the register of Fair Rents to find out the maximum rent that can be charged for registered accommodation that:

  • is rented privately
  • was let before 2 January 1989
  • doesn't have a resident landlord

Requesting printed copies

Details of all registrations of fair rents on individual properties since November 1994 are available on the Fair Rent eRegister or you can request a printed extract from the Rent Service Scotland office.
